mapper.select: SELECT currency_code, rate_date, buy_rate, sell_rate, remittance, receiving, base_rate, prev_rate, usd_conversion_rate FROM exchange_rate_hist WHERE TO_CHAR(rate_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = #{inqDt} AND currency_code = #{currency}

SELECT currency_code, rate_date, buy_rate, sell_rate, remittance, receiving, base_rate, prev_rate, usd_conversion_rate FROM exchange_rate_hist WHERE rate_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND currency_code = #{currency} ORDER BY rate_date ASC
SELECT currency_code, rate_date, buy_rate, sell_rate, remittance, receiving, base_rate, prev_rate, usd_conversion_rate FROM exchange_rate WHERE currency_code = #{currencyCode}
SELECT currency_code, rate_date, buy_rate, sell_rate, remittance, receiving, base_rate, prev_rate, usd_conversion_rate FROM exchange_rate

SELECT currency_code, rate_date, buy_rate, sell_rate, remittance, receiving, base_rate, prev_rate, usd_conversion_rate FROM ( SELECT currency_code, rate_date, buy_rate, sell_rate, remittance, receiving, base_rate, prev_rate, usd_conversion_rate, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY base_rate ASC) as ranking FROM exchange_rate_hist WHERE rate_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND currency_code = #{currency} ) WHERE ranking = 1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
